Title: Provides residency requirements for sex offenders
Summary: Provides residency requirements for sex offenders including criminal sanctions for violations; prohibits sex offenders from residing in a residence that is within one thousand five hundred feet of any school grounds.
LawCode: Amd §§168-b & 168-t, ren §168-w to be §168-x, add §168-w, Cor L; amd §259-c, Exec L; amd §65.10, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, the executive law and the penal law, in relation to certain residency requirements for sex offenders
